channel.title: Alabama on HowIsJT
channel.description: Recent content in Alabama on HowIsJT

item.title: Dadeville Lakehouse Landscape
item.description: At the end of my dad’s construction career he designed and built his grand finale - a home for his bride in her hometown. I was still in school at LSU but found time to draft plans for my parent’s lake house. The home was constructed into the hillside and of course excavation, grading, and utilities left scars. The intent of my landscape plan was to heal these scars and to reunite the home with the surrounding woodland.

item.title: Lake Martin Alabama
item.description: Mom is a small town girl from Dadeville, Alabama. Small towns often have big families, and her Pearson family is no exception. There were three girls and three boys in her family, so I had five sets of aunts and uncles - all of whom resided in Alabama or returned to the state for their retirement. Pearson family reunions are held every summer at an uncle’s lake house, and we try to make it each year.
